testcase.name: Aged Brie quality increases by 1 before sell date
Aged Brie quality increases by 2 on sell date
Aged Brie quality increases by 2 after sell date
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Aged Brie quality increases by 2 after sell date Given the Gilded Rose inventory system ... passed in 0.000s Given an Aged Brie with sellIn -1 and quality 20 ... passed in 0.000s When the system updates quality ... passed in 0.000s Then the quality should be 22 ... passed in 0.000s And the sellIn should be -2 ... passed in 0.000s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: Aged Brie quality never exceeds 50
Aged Brie at quality 49 increases to 50 (not beyond)
Aged Brie at quality 49 after sell date caps at 50
Aged Brie at quality 48 after sell date caps at 50
Aged Brie starting at quality 0 increases normally
Aged Brie with very negative sellIn improves by 2
Aged Brie quality improvement over time -- @1.1
Aged Brie quality improvement over time -- @1.2
Aged Brie quality improvement over time -- @1.3
Aged Brie quality improvement over time -- @1.4
Aged Brie quality improvement over time -- @1.5
